title: $400 Pocophone F1 vs $1100 iPhone XS Max
description: The Apple iPhone XS Max is a great smartphone but can a much cheaper Pocophone stack up? Xiaomi Pocophone F1 on Amazon:  The full Pocophone F1 durability test:   By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.
